translations: （用布）把…...包裹住（swathe 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: She swathed her enormous body in thin black fabrics.
sentences.translation: 她用薄薄的黑色织物裹住了她巨大的身躯。

sentences.sentence: He was lying on the hospital bed, swathed in bandages.
sentences.translation: 他裹着绷带，躺在医院的病床上。

sentences.sentence: His head was swathed in bandages made from a torn sheet.
sentences.translation: 他的头上缠满了许多用床单撕成的绷带。
